revised_title: The Estrous Cycle and Ovarian Function in Mammals
tldr: This article explores the estrous cycle and ovarian function in various mammals, focusing on the bitch. It discusses the histology of the uterus, ovulation, and the role of the corpus luteum in the reproductive process. The authors also examine the influence of ovarian extracts and grafts on the animal's metabolism and behavior.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Reproductive Biology
